title: PMS 2.0 765 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Ja'Marr Chase, Cardinals Beat Reporter Darren Urban, Coach P's Keys With Chuck Pagano From The ThunderDome, Sabrina Ionescu, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, Darius Butler, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about tonight's Thursday Night Football game between the Saints and Cardinals, tonight's SuperBoost exclusively available on FanDuel for DeAndre Hopkins to have 60+ receiving yards and a touchdown, and everything else happening around the NFL as we start week 7. Joining the progrum is 2021 Offensive Rookie of the Year, Pro Bowler, All-Pro, WR for the Cincinnati Bengals, Ja'Marr Chase to chat about his career thus far in the NFL, his relationship with Joe Burrow, adjusting to the NFL game as opposed to college, what the locker room vibe is like, and much more (18:37-33:34). Next, Arizona Cardinals beat reporter, Darren Urban joins the show to chat about the Cardinals struggles this year, what the team needs to do to get going, if there is animosity between Kliff and Kyler, DeAndre Hopkins being back, Robbie Anderson suiting up, if Matt Prater is going to play, and more (39:51-54:52). Later, former Head Coach of the Indianapolis Colts, Chuck Pagano joins the progrum to give his keys to victory for both the Saints (54:54-1:22:47), and the Cardinals (1:25:33-2:08:59) in another installment of Coach P's Keys. Pat also announces that WNBA All-Star/Oregon legend, Sabrina Ionescu will be the Guest Picker on College GameDay this weekend in Eugene, Oregon. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
